New Records: Jason Holder took 4 wickets with four consecutive deliveries, including a hat-trick.
Key Match Events: Jason Holder took 5 wickets for 27 runs.
Akeal Hosein took 4 wickets for 30 runs.
Kieron Pollard scored 41 not out off 25 balls.
Rovman Powell scored 35 not out off 17 balls.
Post-Match Reflections: Jason Holder was named Player of the Match.
Jason Holder was named Player of the Series.
Miscellaneous Highlights: West Indies elected to bat first after winning the toss.
The match was held at Kensington Oval, Bridgetown, Barbados.
